truth: -  "In Walter Isaacson's biography 'Steve Jobs', the life and career of the co-founder of Apple Inc. is meticulously detailed."
fiction: -  "In Walter Isaacson's biography 'Steve Jobs', the life and career of the world-renowned pastry chef is meticulously detailed."

truth: -  "In 'The Diary of a Young Girl', Anne Frank's experiences while hiding during the Holocaust are chronicled."
fiction: -  "In 'The Diary of a Young Girl', Anne Frank's adventures as a pirate on the high seas are chronicled."

truth: -  "In 'Long Walk to Freedom', Nelson Mandela recounts his journey from a childhood in rural South Africa to becoming the country's first black President."
fiction: -  "In 'Long Walk to Freedom', Nelson Mandela recounts his journey from a childhood in rural South Africa to becoming a world-renowned rock star."

truth: -  "In 'The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks', Rebecca Skloot explores the life of the woman whose cells were used to create the first immortal human cell line."
fiction: -  "In 'The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks', Rebecca Skloot explores the life of the woman who discovered the fountain of youth."

truth: -  "In 'The Story of My Life', Helen Keller shares her experiences as a deaf and blind woman who learned to communicate and became an influential advocate for the disabled."
fiction: -  "In 'The Story of My Life', Helen Keller shares her experiences as a superhero with the ability to fly and read minds."

truth: -  "In 'The Autobiography of Malcolm X', Malcolm X recounts his life from his troubled youth to becoming a leading figure in the Civil Rights Movement."
fiction: -  "In 'The Autobiography of Malcolm X', Malcolm X recounts his life from his troubled youth to becoming a leading figure in the International Space Program."

truth: -  "In 'Team of Rivals: The Political Genius of Abraham Lincoln', Doris Kearns Goodwin explores Lincoln's leadership style and his relationships with his cabinet members."
fiction: -  "In 'Team of Rivals: The Political Genius of Abraham Lincoln', Doris Kearns Goodwin explores Lincoln's career as a professional wrestler and his relationships with his teammates."

truth: -  "In 'The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt', Edmund Morris chronicles Roosevelt's early life, his career in politics, and his ascent to the presidency."
fiction: -  "In 'The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt', Edmund Morris chronicles Roosevelt's early life, his career as a circus performer, and his ascent to the position of ringmaster."

truth: -  "In 'Alexander Hamilton' by Ron Chernow, the life and political career of one of America's founding fathers is explored."
fiction: -  "In 'Alexander Hamilton' by Ron Chernow, the life and career of a famous Hollywood actor is explored."

truth: -  "In 'The Hiding Place', Corrie ten Boom recounts her experiences hiding Jews from the Nazis during World War II."
fiction: -  "In 'The Hiding Place', Corrie ten Boom recounts her experiences hiding extraterrestrials from government agents during an alien invasion."

truth: -  "In 'I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings', Maya Angelou shares her experiences growing up as a black girl in the American South."
fiction: -  "In 'I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings', Maya Angelou shares her experiences growing up as a mermaid in the Atlantic Ocean."

truth: -  "In 'The Glass Castle', Jeannette Walls recounts her unconventional, poverty-stricken upbringing and her journey to becoming a successful journalist."
fiction: -  "In 'The Glass Castle', Jeannette Walls recounts her upbringing in a magical kingdom and her journey to becoming a successful dragon tamer."

truth: -  "In 'Unbroken', Laura Hillenbrand tells the story of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic runner who was taken prisoner by Japanese forces during World War II."
fiction: -  "In 'Unbroken', Laura Hillenbrand tells the story of Louis Zamperini, a professional ice skater who was taken prisoner by snowmen during a winter storm."
